de.mrapp.android.dialog.decorator

Class AbstractDialogFragmentDecorator<DialogType extends Dialog>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.dialog.decorator.AbstractDecorator<DialogType,androidx.fragment.app.FragmentManager>
      • de.mrapp.android.dialog.decorator.AbstractDialogFragmentDecorator<DialogType>
  • Type Parameters:
    DialogType - The type of the dialog, whose view hierarchy is modified by the decorator
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Dialog, DialogDecorator
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    WizardDialogDecorator

    public abstract class AbstractDialogFragmentDecorator<DialogType extends Dialog>
extends AbstractDecorator<DialogType,androidx.fragment.app.FragmentManager>
    An abstract base class for all decorators, which allow to modify the view hierarchy of a dialog, which is able to show fragments.
    Since:
    3.2.0
    Author:
    Michael Rapp

      AbstractDialogFragmentDecorator(DialogType dialog)

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractDialogFragmentDecorator

        public AbstractDialogFragmentDecorator(@NonNull
                                       DialogType dialog)
        Creates a new decorator, which allows to modify the view hierarchy of a dialog.
        Parameters:
        dialog - The dialog, whose view hierarchy should be modified by the decorator, as an instance of the generic type DialogType. The dialog may not be null
